title: Watch Tab Events
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is using the app
WHEN the user navigates to specific sections of the Watch tab
THEN the following analytics events are recording for the corresponding action:

MLB At Bat : Android : Watch : Watch Now
MLB At Bat : Android : Watch : MLB.TV EPG
MLB At Bat : Android : Watch : Film Room

title: Analytics URL
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is using the Android mobile app
WHEN the user performs an action that has a corresponding analytics event
THEN the analytics event is sent to this URL: https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net/b/ss/mlbat.bat.android/10/JAVA-1.2.4-1.5.4-AN/...

title: MLB.tv Playback
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is using the app
WHEN the user begins playback of an MLB.tv stream
THEN the following events are sent at the appropriate times:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Start
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Complete

When switching feeds validate that the Video Dimensions are updated where applicable:
video.contentId
video.context - should have page that launched it { Scoreboard | EPG }
video.fgui

title: Team Page Events
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is using the app
WHEN the user navigates to a specific team's page
THEN the following events are sent at the appropriate times:
MLB At Bat : Android : Team : <CLUB ABBREVIATION>

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Scoreboard is navigated to
AND there are no current live games
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard" is sent

eg. 10-28 13:13:31.006 21822 21822 I a       : Tracking State: MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the scoreboard is changed to compact mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN trackAction @"MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard : Toggle State Compact" is sent

eg. 10-28 13:19:11.955 21822 21822 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard : Toggle State Compact

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the scoreboard is changed to card mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN trackAction @"MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard : Toggle State Card" is sent
eg. 10-28 13:22:44.634 21822 21822 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard : Toggle State Card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Scoreboard is navigated to and it is in Compact mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an event will fire with page.state=Compact
eg. 10-28 13:31:01.688 21822 21822 I a       :  Event Data {app.version=10.2.2.32, cell.wifi=WIFI, device.id=ANDROID_673a74f8-03d4-43de-894b-fb9d7112e032, features=, entitlements=, ipid.mlbam=, okta.id=, macaddress.1=, zip=80503, operating.system=11, status.settingslanguage=en, user.favoriteTeams=, time.stamp=1635449461688, settings.hideSpoilers=false, page.state=Compact}

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Scoreboard is navigated to and it is in Card mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an event will fire with page.state=Card
eg. 10-28 13:35:13.980 21822 21822 I a       :  Event Data {app.version=10.2.2.32, cell.wifi=WIFI, device.id=ANDROID_673a74f8-03d4-43de-894b-fb9d7112e032, features=, entitlements=, ipid.mlbam=, okta.id=, macaddress.1=, zip=80503, operating.system=11, status.settingslanguage=en, user.favoriteTeams=, time.stamp=1635449713979, settings.hideSpoilers=false, page.state=Card}

title: Onboarding Page Events
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user in onboarding
WHEN the Welcome is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Get Started"  is sent

GIVEN a user in onboarding
WHEN the Sign Up page is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Sign Up"  is sent

GIVEN a user in onboarding
WHEN the Login page is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Log In"  is sent

GIVEN a user in onboarding
WHEN the Favorite Teams selector is shown
AND the location permission dialog is displayed
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Settings : Location Services Modal" is sent

GIVEN a user in onboarding
WHEN the Favorite Teams selector is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Settings : Favorite Teams" is sent

GIVEN a user in onboarding
WHEN the Notification Preferences is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Settings : Notification"  is sent

title: Standings Page Events
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user 
WHEN the Standings page is shown
AND the Divisional tab is selected
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Standings : Divisional" is sent

GIVEN a user 
WHEN the Standings page is shown
AND the Wild Card tab is selected
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Standings : Wild Card" is sent

title: News Page Events
custom_steps:
GIVE a user 
WHEN the News Page is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : News : <MLB|Club Abbreviation>" is sent

GIVE a user 
WHEN the a news article is shown
THEN  trackState "MLB At Bad : Android : News Article" is sent
AND *additional metadata is provided

 

Additional Meta Data:

article.contentid | Article - Content ID | the Content ID of the article being viewed | best-free-agents-by-position-2020
article.author | Article - Author | the Author of the article being viewed | Mark Feinsand
article.headline | Article - Headline | the current Headline of the article being viewed (localized) | Position by position: Top free agents available

title: Scoreboard Live Page Events
custom_steps:
WHEN the Scoreboard is shown
AND there are live games
custom_expected: THEN  trackState "MLB At Bat : Android : Scoreboard : Live" is sent

title: Crashlytics
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user in the MLB app
WHEN a crash is generated
THEN a log should be generated in Crashlytics

title: DataDog Enable/Disable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that DataDog has been configured
AND access to the DataDog tool is available
AND the app is launched and being used

Notes: The feature toggle is the enable_datadog param the in the Firebase config (eg. https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the DataDog tool is configured so 100% of device sessions will report 
AND the app is https-debug-proxied via Charles
AND the user is navigating around in the app, playing video, etc
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN regular posts containing data to: rum-http-intake.logs.datadoghq.eu/v1/input/ and mobile-http-intake.logs.datadoghq.eu/v1/input/ can be observed in Charles

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Datadog tool is checked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the events or event counts seen posted in Charles can be seen in the tool

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the enable_datadog setting is set to false in firebase
AND the app is restarted twice
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client will stop posting to DataDog

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the enable_datadog setting is set to true in firebase
AND the app is restarted twice
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client will resume posting to DataDog

title: Tab Bar Events
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB app is launched
AND device logs are being monitored with: adb logcat | grep -i 'Tracking Action'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Team tab is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a log entry similar to the below is seen.
09-23 11:47:47.534 29734 29734 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB AtBat : Android : Navigation : Tab : Team Click

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Scores tab is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a log entry similar to the below is seen.
09-23 11:47:47.534 29734 29734 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB AtBat : Android : Navigation : Tab : Scores Click

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the News tab is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a log entry similar to the below is seen.
09-23 11:47:47.534 29734 29734 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB AtBat : Android : Navigation : Tab : News Click

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Standings tab is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a log entry similar to the below is seen.
09-23 11:47:47.534 29734 29734 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB AtBat : Android : Navigation : Tab : Standings Click

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Stats tab is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a log entry similar to the below is seen.
09-23 11:47:47.534 29734 29734 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB AtBat : Android : Navigation : Tab : Stats Click

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN (
the attached file is mapped to eg. https://storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/appnavigation_en.json
AND at least three minutes have elapsed
AND the app is restarted 
     )
OR it is Postseason
AND the Postseason tab is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a log entry similar to the below is seen.
09-23 11:47:47.534 29734 29734 I a       : Tracking Action: MLB AtBat : Android : Navigation : Tab : Postseason Click

title: Firebase  Analytics screen_view and video events
custom_preconds:
Access to the Firebase Analytics console for the code under test (eg. currently mlb-mobile-npd for the Develop build)
adb is installed on your machine and the following are run: (from https://firebase.google.com/docs/analytics/debugview)
adb shell setprop debug.firebase.analytics.app com.bamnetworks.mobile.android.gameday.atbat
adb shell setprop log.tag.FA VERBOSE
adb shell setprop log.tag.FA-SVC VERBOSE
adb logcat -v time -s FA FA-SVC 

Your device should then be selected in the debug view dropdown, eg.
https://console.firebase.google.com/project/mlb-mobile-npd/analytics/app/android:com.bamnetworks.mobile.android.ballpark.qa/debugview/~2F%3Ft%3D1633554902530&fpn%3D518717772311&swu%3D1&sgu%3D1&sus%3Dnot_upgraded&params%3D_u..pageSize%253D100&cs%3Dapp.m.debugview.overview&g%3D1

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a 'page-level' navigation occurs, eg. tap on Teams, Sores, Stats, Postseason, Settings, About MLB, Watch, MLB.TV, MLB.Audio, Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a screen_view event will be logged in Firebase Analytics with a firebase_name similar to the page name

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB.TV content is successfully streamed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the events video_video_attempt_success and video_video_start are logged

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB.TV content is 25% complete (hint: use a short video for this and next 3 steps)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the event video_video_25_complete is logged

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB.TV content is 50% complete
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the event video_video_50_complete is logged

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB.TV content is 75% complete
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the event video_video_75_complete is logged

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB.TV content has played to completion
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the event video_video_complete is logged

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN MLB.TV content is playing
AND the view is toggled between landscape and portrait
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the event video_video_player_changed_state is logged

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB.TV streaming is attempted and fails (eg. user needs to log in first so Paywall displays)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a video_video_attempt_<reason> event is logged, eg. for Paywall video_video_attempt_paywall

title: Qualtrics Survey
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a USER
AND an active qualtrics survey is configured for your app/environment

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the firebase config Qualtrics/enable_qualtrics_sdk is set to false
AND the app has been restarted since the last display of the survey invite
OR the app has otherwise just been started
AND the user spends at least 60 seconds in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the survey invite will not display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the firebase config Qualtrics/enable_qualtrics_sdk is set to true
AND the app has been restarted since the last display of the survey invite
OR the app has otherwise just been started
AND the user spends at least 60 seconds in the app
(Note: you may have to clear app data depending on survey settings.)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the survey invite will display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Qualtrics survey invite is displaying
AND the Dismiss button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the invite will dismiss
AND it will not display again until the app is restarted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Qualtrics survey invite is displaying
AND the Take Survey button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the survey will open

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the survey is open
AND the user taps the X to close it
OR the user completes the survey
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THE the survey will dismiss
AND the invite will not display again until the app is restarted

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is successfully sent to MLB.tv
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Success

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user must used the MVPD flow to authenticate
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Fail MVPD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is directed to the Paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Fail Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user tries to stream the free game of the day and must login to continue
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Fail FGOTD

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user’s location is mocked
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Fail Mocked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an error occurs and the user is not directed to the MLB.TV fragment for unknown reasons
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Fail Unknown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user is blacked out
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Video : Video Attempt : Fail Blackout

title: Gameday event
custom_steps: WHEN a link to Gameday is tapped (eg. compact scoreboard tile)
custom_expected:
THEN the following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : Gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an archive game is successfully started
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN then following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : View Archive Video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a live game is successfully started
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN then following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : View Live Video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN other video is started (eg. from the Team page)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN then following page is logged:
MLB At Bat : Android : View Video

title: DataDog MediaPlaybackException events
custom_preconds:
GIVEN access to DataDog logs section eg.: https://app.datadoghq.eu/logs?cols=host%2Cservice&context_event=AQAAAXxXl7GFVQtwKAAAAABBWHhYbU1JT0FBQzAxbm9Od1J6Rl9RQUE&event&from_ts=1634072611120&index=&live=true&messageDisplay=inline&query=service%3Acom.bamnetworks.mobile.android.gameday.atbat+%40session_id%3A00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000+%40network.client.ip%3A75.71.64.114&stream_sort=desc&to_ts=1634073511120&viz=
AND filtering on your external IP address
AND filtering on the last 15 minutes
AND Proxied via Charles
custom_steps:
WHEN video is started
AND a video error is generated (eg. the playback URL is added to the block list)
custom_expected: THEN a media playback error will be logged in DataDog

title: Crashlytics Video Player Events
custom_preconds:
GIVEN access to the Crashlytics instance for the test version and environment (eg. https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/crashlytics/app/android:com.bamnetworks.mobile.android.gameday.atbat/issues?time=last-seven-days&type=all&state=open&tag=all)
AND user has noted their Device UUID from About MLB
custom_steps:
WHEN a video player error (not just crash) occurs (eg. add playback URL to the block list)
AND a couple hours have elapsed to wait for data to be polled
AND the the Crashlytics dashboard is opened
AND a appropriate timeframe is selected
AND Search By User Id is selected
AND the test devices UUID is entered
custom_expected:
THEN a detailed error from the video event will be seen
AND can be selected
AND can be seen logged in the Logs tab

title: News Page Recommended and Related Events
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the News tab
AND a story is tapped
AND a story in the Related or Recommended section is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the following event is posted:
 MLB At Bat : Android : News Article

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Lite user
WHEN an in-line banner ad is viewed on the Team page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an ad impression event is sent
eg. AMACTION:MLB At Bat : Android : Display Ad Impression

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Lite user
WHEN each in-line banner ad is viewed on the Scoreboard page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an ad impression event is sent
eg. AMACTION:MLB At Bat : Android : Display Ad Impression

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Lite user
WHEN each in-line banner ad is viewed on the News page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an ad impression event is sent
eg. AMACTION:MLB At Bat : Android : Display Ad Impression

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user
WHEN a game is streamed
AND a DAI ad is viewed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a video ad impression event is sent
eg. AMACTION:MLB At Bat : Android : Video Ad Impression

title: DataDog and OKTA ID
custom_preconds:
Notes:
- DataDog Event explorer: https://app.datadoghq.eu/rum/explorer?query=%40application.id%3A853895a7-e52b-4f4e-a16d-1a180428e990&tab=session&from_ts=1639403391382&to_ts=1639406991382&live=true
- filter on https://mlbentitlementservices.mlb.com/entitlements with Charles while logging in to get user's OKTA ID
- warning: dataDog events may not get logged when proxying via Charles
- set filter @usr.id:<OKTA ID> in DataDog to see only events for that user
custom_steps:
GIVEN a Free or Entitled User using a device running DataDog
WHEN navigating to any app fragments eg. pages, playing video, etc
custom_expected: THEN a DataDog event will be logged containing a user id in the json attributes that is the user's OKTA ID

title: Preroll Ads Analytics Events
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views a video on the highlights tab of the Watch View or the Video Carousel of Team Page
AND a preroll ad plays
custom_expected: THEN logs will indicate a tracking event for "MLB At Bat : Android : Video Ad Impression"

title: Apple TV+/Peacock modal state and tracking
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user that is blacked out of Android TV+/Peacock games

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks a live Apple TV+ game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app redirects to the player
AND the user sees the Apple TV+ blackout modal
AND Adobe Analytics tracking state includes "Apple TV+ Modal"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user dismisses the Apple TV+ blackout modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Adobe Analytics tracking action includes "Apple TV+ Modal : Dismiss Click"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks a live Peacock game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app redirects to the player
AND the user sees the Peacock blackout modal
AND Adobe Analytics tracking state includes "Peacock Modal"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user dismisses the Peacock blackout modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Adobe Analytics tracking action includes "Peacock Modal : Dismiss Click"

title: Analytics - Video Playback,  contentID and slug parameters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user of the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN video is played or autoplays from Team home, Scores tab, News/video tab or team video page (see all)
custom_expected:
THEN tracking calls will be made in the form:
trackAction: MLB At Bat : <Platform Name> : Video : Video <event type> 
AND the following params will be sent:

video.slug - the last part of the video URL ex: "jp-crawford-walk-off-home-run”
video.contentId - ex: "d26c91c0-aa942393-b2f4f861-csvm-diamondx64-asset”

title: Analytics - Video Playback,  autoplay and context parameters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user of the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN video is played or autoplays from Team home, Scores tab, News/video tab or team video page (see all)
custom_expected:
THEN tracking calls will be made in the form:
trackAction: MLB At Bat : <Platform Name> : Video : Video <event type> 
AND the following params will be sent:

video.autoplay : Video Autoplay Flag: true/false 
video.context : Video Context. Where the video is being played/accessed in the app - probably mostly from the video/news tab and the home page 

Expected Video Contexts for Team, Scoreboard, and News:
Team Home
Team Home : More Videos
Gameday Wrap
Gameday : Summary : Scoring
Gameday : Summary : All Plays
Gameday : Videos
News Videos
